long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MediReminder - Your Personal Medicine Reminder

Never forget to take your medication again with MediReminder! This Google Chrome extension is your personal assistant for managing your medication schedule seamlessly.

Features:

Customizable Reminders: Set up reminders for your medications with just a few clicks. Choose the frequency, time, and dosage for each medication to suit your needs.
Flexible Scheduling: Whether you need reminders daily, weekly, or at specific intervals, MediReminder has you covered. You can also set different schedules for different medications.
Snooze Option: If you're busy when a reminder pops up, simply snooze it for later. You can customize the snooze duration to fit your schedule.
Visual Alerts: Receive visual alerts right in your browser, so you never miss a reminder. The intuitive interface makes it easy to see which medications you need to take and when.
Secure and Private: Your medication schedule is private and secure. We don't store any personal data or medication information on our servers.
How to Use:

Install the MediReminder Chrome extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Open the extension and add your medications, specifying the name, dosage, and schedule for each.
Sit back and relax as MediReminder takes care of the rest! You'll receive timely reminders to take your medications, ensuring you stay on track with your health goals.
Compatibility:

MediReminder works seamlessly on Google Chrome across all platforms, including Windows, Mac, and Linux.

Don't let forgetfulness affect your health. Try MediReminder today and take control of your medication schedule!
